Notes: Required - 'yes' or 'no' indicating if medical attention needed or received - Controls conditional fields
Injury description - Required if medical_attention_needed = 'yes' (e.g., whiplash, bruising, broken bones)
Severity level - Required if medical_attention_needed = 'yes' (minor, moderate, serious, severe, critical)
Hospital/medical center name - Optional (e.g., Royal London Hospital, NHS Walk-in Centre)
Ambulance called - Required if medical_attention_needed = 'yes' ('yes' or 'no')
Treatment description - Shown if medical_ambulance_called = 'yes' (e.g., painkillers, X-rays, stitches)
Symptom: Chest pain - User experiencing chest pain
Symptom: Uncontrolled bleeding - Active bleeding that won't stop
Symptom: Breathlessness - Difficulty breathing
Symptom: Limb weakness or changes in sensation - Numbness, tingling, or weakness
Symptom: Dizziness - Feeling lightheaded or dizzy
Symptom: Loss of consciousness - Blacking out or fainting
Symptom: Severe headache - Intense head pain
Symptom: Change in vision - Blurred vision, double vision, or vision loss
Symptom: Abdominal pain - Stomach or abdominal discomfort
Symptom: Abdominal bruising - Visible bruising on stomach area
Symptom: Limb pain that's impeding mobility - Pain preventing normal movement
Symptom: Any other concerns that a life or limb threatening injury has occurred
Symptom: None of these I feel fine and am ready to continue - No symptoms present
JavaScript-generated timestamp when page was completed (new Date().toISOString()) - Stored in sessionStorage
